Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%input Input The text that was inserted in the dialog</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>
[Ljava.lang.String;

Action.Str:
Select the time of day you want your volumes to return to normal.
### NOTE ### The time must be in 24 hour format.
If you want a time between 1:00PM and 11:59PM, add 12 to the hour.
If you want a time during the midnight hour (12:00AM to 12:59AM), the hour is represented as "00".
Otherwise, morning hours do not require the leading zero.

Task.nme: Volume Control: Setup: Input: Start Work

[Ljava.lang.String;

Action.Str:
Select the time of day you want your volumes lowered.
### NOTE ### The time must be in 24 hour format.
If you want a time between 1:00PM and 11:59PM, add 12 to the hour.
If you want a time during the midnight hour (12:00AM to 12:59AM), the hour is represented as "00".
Otherwise, morning hours do not require the leading zero.

Task.nme: Volume Control: Setup: Profiles: Enable
Volume Control: App: End
Volume Control: App: Start
Volume Control: Setup: App

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%td_button Button The label of the button that was clicked</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>
[Ljava.lang.String;

Action.Str:
On the following dialogs, you'll enter the times at which your volumes should change, your work calendar, optionally your holiday calendar, and the numeric values for each of the volume categories. You'll enter a value both low and high. Your current setting for each volume control will be the default values.
If you want to check the maximum volumes available, tap Exit and the profile that launches this installer will turn off. When you're ready, just turn the profile back on and this installer will launch again.
The range of values is typically either 0 to 15 or 0 to 25. It varies depending on the manufacturer and the version of Android. This installer assumes a maximum of 25.
Your calendars are used to determine weekdays that should be excluded from volume adjustments. If you aren't using Google calendars, you'll need to set these directly in the profile.
Click "Full Setup" to set all variables (including calendars) or "Partial Setup" to set all variable (except calendars).

Action.label: Set the work times.
Action.Str: Volume Control: Setup: Controller: Work Times

Task.nme: Volume Control: Setup: Input: Alarm Low
